column2: stopped here before I had to fly out. Ordered the 1/2 slab of baby back ribs. My two sides were the brisket chili
column4: and it already comes with slaw. These ribs were the best I have ever had. I didn't even need bbq sauce. Just ate it dry
column5: meat just fell right off the bones. Loved the way they smoked the ribs
column6: flavor was bursting. Chili was excellent
column7: and fries were great. Their slaw was good
column8: but may take time to get used to it. Overall experience was more then expected. Would love to come back if I'm ever in town again!
